short_summary: LiDAR and orthophotos acquisition for Waterton Lakes National Park
description: Request for proposal to acquire LiDAR and orthophotos data for the development of a new vegetation cover mapping exercise for Waterton Lakes National Park
full_summary:
--------------------


### LiDAR and Orthophotography Acquisition

#### Project Title: 

*English: *LiDAR and Orthophotography Acquisition – Waterton Lakes National Park*
*French: *Acquisition de données par lidar et orthophotographie – parc national des Lacs-Waterton*

#### Reference and Solicitation Numbers

* English: *Reference Number: cb-7173-25384549; Solicitation Number: 5P420-23-0073A*
* French: *Numéro de référence : cb-7173-25384549; Numéro de sollicitation : 5P420-23-0073A*

#### Tender Notice

This solicitation invites qualified bidders to submit proposals for the acquisition of LiDAR and orthophotography data for Waterton Lakes National Park in Alberta, Canada.

The park requires the acquisition of LiDAR and orthophotos during full leaf out of the forest canopy in 2023. The data will provide essential information on fuel loading and plant community characteristics needed for vegetation classification and mapping.

### Important Dates

* Publication Date: 2023-07-12
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-08-09T16:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-08-16
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-01-30

### Documents Required

Proposal documents, including the solicitation documents, addenda, and contract templates, are available on the Government Electronic Tendering Service at www.canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities. Bidders are responsible for obtaining documents directly from the source.

### Electronic Tendering

Tenders must be submitted electronically via the soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca email address. Faxed or verbally submitted tenders will not be accepted. The maximum file size for email submissions is 15 megabytes.

### Classification and Basic Requirements

* UNSPC Code: *82131601*
* Classification: *Aerial photography services*

### Languages of Communication

Tenders may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The Government of Canada intends to conduct business in both English and French.

### Contracting Entity
Parcs Canada
Address: 220 4 Ave SE
Calgary, Alberta, T2G 4X3, Canada
Phone: (403) 589-3402
Fax: 1-866-246-6893
